column1: The GenBank ( http: / / www. ncbi. nlm. nih. gov / Genbank) accession numbers for the genes and gene products discussed in this paper are fly bonus ( AAF19646), human TIF1 alpha ( 015164), human TIF1 beta ( Q13263), human TIF gamma ( Q9UPN9), human TIF1 gamma ( Q9UPN9), mon ( AY59853), mouse Tif1 alpha ( Q64127), mouse Tif1 beta ( AAH58391), and mouse Tif1 gamma ( NP444400).
